segments.text: Room Reservations . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to cancel a reservation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In whose name was the reservation made ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What was the date of the reservation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me , but is the reservation for yourself or for another party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have your name and phone number , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it's Zheg In and my number is 3811658 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , sir . I will cancel Mr . White's reservation from November 21st for 4 nights . We look forward to another chance to serve you .
segments.speaker: S1
